rights.description: Agency must respond within 5 business days by acknowledging receipt and providing reasonable time estimate, providing records, or denying with legal basis
rights.conditions: Hard 5 business day deadline for initial response
rights.implementation_notes: Agency must take one of three actions: provide records, provide time estimate, or deny with legal basis
rights.request_tips: Track submission date - agency must respond within 5 business days

rights.description: Cannot charge for staff time to search or review records for redaction
rights.conditions: May only charge for customized services, not routine search/review
rights.implementation_notes: Strong protection against excessive fees for routine requests
rights.request_tips: If charged for search or redaction time, cite prohibition - only actual copying costs and customized services allowed

rights.description: May charge actual cost of copying; cannot exceed actual cost
rights.conditions: Fees limited to actual, direct costs
rights.implementation_notes: No markup or overhead charges permitted
rights.request_tips: Challenge fees exceeding actual reproduction cost; request itemized breakdown

rights.description: Court shall award reasonable attorney fees and costs to prevailing requester; penalties up to $100/day for improper denials
rights.implementation_notes: Daily penalties create strong incentive for compliance
rights.request_tips: If wrongfully denied, penalties up to $100/day plus attorney fees are mandatory for prevailing requesters

rights.description: No identification or purpose statement required; may request in person, by mail, or email
rights.conditions: Must identify requested records with reasonable specificity
rights.implementation_notes: Cannot be overly broad but no personal identification required
rights.request_tips: You do not need to identify yourself or state purpose; describe records sought

rights.description: Must designate Public Records Officer (PRO) as primary contact for requests
rights.request_tips: Direct requests to designated Public Records Officer for faster response

rights.description: Electronic submission of requests accepted; email requests valid
rights.implementation_notes: Enables convenient remote submission with email trail
rights.request_tips: Submit via email for documentation and faster delivery

rights.description: Liberally construed to promote public policy; exemptions narrowly construed
rights.implementation_notes: Creates strong presumption in favor of disclosure
rights.request_tips: Cite liberal construction mandate when challenging restrictive interpretations

rights.description: If immediate response not possible, must provide reasonable time estimate based on nature and volume of records
rights.conditions: Required when records cannot be provided within 5 days
rights.implementation_notes: Prevents indefinite delays - agency must commit to timeline
rights.request_tips: If not provided within 5 days, demand reasonable time estimate and hold agency to it

rights.description: Must communicate regularly about status of request
rights.implementation_notes: Prevents agencies from going silent during processing
rights.request_tips: If no updates provided, demand status communication citing this requirement

rights.description: May seek clarification but must provide reasonable time estimate
rights.conditions: Cannot use clarification as delay tactic
rights.implementation_notes: Agencies can clarify vague requests but must still respond timely
rights.request_tips: If agency seeks clarification, they must still provide time estimate for response

rights.description: Must provide access to inspect records during business hours
rights.request_tips: Request in-person inspection to avoid reproduction costs

validation_metadata.notes: All rights extracted from verified jurisdiction-data.json file. Washington has strong requester protections including: 5 business day response deadline, prohibition on search/redaction fees, mandatory penalties up to $100/day for improper denials, mandatory attorney fees for prevailing requesters, and liberal construction mandate.
